name: Toil & Trouble (DaveHampster)
description:
A highly unstable potion-mixing game! Mix colorful ingredients into a potion you don’t know how to make before it blows up!!

Consult the recipe book on the table.  This will show you the color of your final potion.  Each ingredient will add or subtract a color value to the cauldron when dropped in.  Try to get as close as you can to the target recipe, but be careful many of the ingredients are unstable and the concoction may just blow up in your face!

  • WASD - Move
  • Space - Interact
  • Escape - Restart

Most of the programming: @davehampster Pixel art & animation: @eveenova Design & etc: @hampster and @eveenova
